subject: Regarding Inner Class  - Junit
msgSnippet: Hi I have few queries . 1) I have program which will print the details . 2) Iam planning to convert this to Junit . 3) I want to know whether it is possible to
messageBody:
Hi
I have few queries .

1) I have program which will print the details .
2) Iam planning to convert this to Junit .
3) I want to know whether it is possible to have inner class
inside junit class. Bcoz one of the method in my class
will accept parameter as a object ,which in turn should
implement runnable interface .

The above mentioned thing can been easily in the test program
without junit code .

snippet code :-
private class Job implements java.lang.Runnable {
private int number;
public Job(int num) {
number = num;
}
public void run() {
System.out.println("This is job# " + number);
try {
java.lang.Thread.sleep(5000);
}
catch( java.lang.Exception e ) {
}
}
}
}

// The pool is another class ,which has a method called
addJob which accepts parameter of type object which inturn
implements runnable .
pool.addJob(new Job(7));

I want to implement the same thing in Junit .Whether it is
possible in junit or not

Expecting reply with info / suggesstions are welcome

Thx
Bala
